abstract: John T Booker Jr pleads guilty to weapons charges, admitting he wanted to help Islamic State group in plot to plant 1,000-pound bomb outside Fort Riley Army post in Kansas; faces up to 30 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: A man whose lawyer says he is mentally ill pleaded guilty Wednesday in a plot to plant a bomb outside an Army post, acknowledging that he wanted to aid the Islamic State group.

headline.main: Kansas: Guilty Plea Entered in Plot Against Army Post
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Guilty Plea Entered in Plot Against Army Post

snippet: A man whose lawyer says he is mentally ill pleaded guilty Wednesday in a plot to plant a bomb outside an Army post, acknowledging that he wanted to aid the Islamic State group.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
